message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with network error correction coding in packet networks, which involves information theory (cs.IT) and network infrastructure (cs.NI). The paper also discusses the construction of linear network error correction codes, which involves algorithms and data structures (cs.DS). The error correction capability of random linear network error correction coding is also studied, which involves statistical methods and machine learning (cs.SI). Finally, the paper discusses upper bounds on failure probabilities, which involves complexity theory and cryptography (cs.CC).
